definitions.definition: To perform the religious act of the baptism, to baptise.
definitions.example: The new baby was christened at the village church.
I christen this ship the Bonny Barnacle.

definitions.definition: To use for the first time.
definitions.example: I christened my new boots today with a walk in the snow.

definitions.definition: To douse or wet with blood, urine, tears, or other liquid.
The Christian sacrament at which someone, usually a child, is baptized and given a Christian name.
Any instance of someone's or something's being christened.
